edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng

Class ManagerLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.ManagerLayer

  • public class ManagerLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class responds to API requests directed at models by contacting their respective entity managers eagerly initialized, the instance of this class is thread safe, provided all methods are thread safe Remember Thread Safety All methods must be thread safe

      • advancedGet

        public java.lang.String advancedGet(java.lang.String[] args,
                           javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cook)
                             throws WPISuiteException
        Advanced Get forwards advanced get requests to the correct entity manager
        Parameters:
        args - - A String array of the parameters
        cook - - The cookie forward
        Returns:
        String - the returned value from the advancedGet call
        Throws:
        WPISuiteException

      • advancedPut

        public java.lang.String advancedPut(java.lang.String[] args,
                           java.lang.String content,
                           javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cook)
                             throws WPISuiteException
        Advanced Put ********************** A note about advanced put. the content body should not contain any line breaks. only the first line will be passed through to the function. ********************** does the same thing as advanced GET except that it also forwards as well as the path arguments
        Parameters:
        args - - the path arguments of the request
        content - - the content body of the request
        cook - - the cookie sent along with the request
        Returns:
        String - a string response to send back
        Throws:
        WPISuiteException
